se.sics.tasim.props

Class BOMBundle

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.sics.tasim.props.BOMBundle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Transportable

    public class BOMBundle
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transportable, java.io.Serializable
    BOMBundle contains information about which products that can be produced and which components that are needed for each product. A BOMBundle is typically send in the beginning of a game/ simulation.

    Warning: serialized objects of this class might not be compatible with future versions. Only use serialization of this class for temporary storage or RMI using the same version of the class.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getSubstitutesForProductID

        public int[] getSubstitutesForProductID(int productID)
        Returns an array of productIDs that represent substitutes for the specified productID or null if no such substitutes exists.

        Note: product substitutes are not used in TAC03 SCM.

      • getSubstitutes

        public int[] getSubstitutes(int index)
        Returns an array of productIDs that represent substitutes for the productID at position index or null if no such substitutes exists.

        Note: product substitutes are not used in TAC03 SCM.
